MessagingTestCase

Similar to TransactionTestCase, but use transaction.atomic() to achieve

Module Contents¶

messaging.tests.User¶
class messaging.tests.MessagingTestCase(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: rest_framework.test.APITestCase

Similar to TransactionTestCase, but use transaction.atomic() to achieve test isolation.

In most situations, TestCase should be preferred to TransactionTestCase as it allows faster execution. However, there are some situations where using TransactionTestCase might be necessary (e.g. testing some transactional behavior).

On database backends with no transaction support, TestCase behaves as TransactionTestCase.

setUp()¶

Set up test data. Create a test user, generate a token, and authenticate the client.

test_create_message_with_actions()¶

Test creating a new message with actions.

test_trigger_message_action()¶

Test triggering an action from a message.

test_invalid_action_trigger()¶

Test triggering an invalid action from a message.
